name: Videocart-1: Tic-Tac-Toe & Shooting Gallery & Doodle & Quadra-Doodle
summary: Videocart-1: Tic Tac Toe, Shooting Gallery, Doodle, Quadradoodle is a board game genre video game released in 1976 by Fairchild Semiconductor for the Fairchild Channel F.
